original_text: And when the time of the fruit drew near, he sent his servants to the husbandmen, that they might receive the fruits of it.
korean_text: 열매 거둘 때가 가까우매 그 열매를 받으려고 자기 종들을 농부들에게 보내니

sentences.original_text: And when the time of the fruit drew near
he sent his servants to the husbandmen
that they might receive the fruits of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그것의 열매를 받게 하기 위함이었습니다
